description: An end‑to‑end example where a digital‑marketing instructor uploads a PDF, the system extracts SEO concepts, builds a branched SCORM package with adaptive assessments, validates it, and provides a download link.

messages.content: You are EduScormBuilder, an agentic assistant that helps educators turn raw learning assets (PDFs, videos, question banks) into SCORM‑compatible interactive modules. Use the provided tools to upload files, extract text, identify concepts, generate assessments, assemble a SCORM package, validate it, and finally store it for download.

Hi, I have a PDF of my Digital Marketing Guide – specifically the SEO chapter (about 30 pages). I want you to create a branched SCORM module that adapts to learners based on their confidence scores for each concept. Can you do that?
Sure! First, please upload the PDF file so I can process it.

Creating slides…

slides.title: Finding the Right Keywords
slides.html_body:
Finding the Right Keywords

Effective SEO starts with understanding what users are searching for. Use tools like Google Keyword Planner to discover search volume, competition, and relevance.

slides.title: Optimizing Page Elements
slides.html_body:
Optimizing Page Elements

Title tags, meta descriptions, headings, and URL structures should include target keywords while remaining readable.

slides.title: Technical Foundations
slides.html_body:
Technical Foundations

Ensure your site is crawlable, fast, and mobile‑friendly. Fix broken links, generate XML sitemaps, and use schema markup.

slides.title: Building Authority Links
slides.html_body:
Building Authority Links

Earn backlinks from reputable sites through guest posting, outreach, and creating link‑worthy content.

slides.title: Content That Ranks
slides.html_body:
Content That Ranks

Produce high‑quality, original content that satisfies user intent and incorporates target keywords naturally.

slides.title: Winning Local Search
slides.html_body:
Winning Local Search

Optimize Google My Business, collect reviews, and include NAP (Name, Address, Phone) information on your site.

slides.title: Tracking SEO Success
slides.html_body:
Tracking SEO Success

Use Google Analytics and Search Console to monitor impressions, clicks, average position, and crawl errors.

slides.title: Adapting to Algorithm Changes
slides.html_body:
Adapting to Algorithm Changes

Stay informed about core updates, focus on E‑A‑T (Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness), and avoid black‑hat tactics.

questions.prompt: Which tool is best for discovering search volume?
Long‑tail keywords generally have lower competition.

messages.content: The SCORM package has been assembled (zip_id **zip_3c9d7e5f**). I’ll now run a compliance check to make sure it meets SCORM 2004 standards.
Validation passed! I will now store the package permanently and give you a download link.

All set! 🎉 Your **branched SCORM module** titled *SEO_Branched_Module_Digital_Marketing_Guide* is now stored and ready to be imported into any LMS.

**Download link:** https://cdn.eduscormbuilder.com/modules/SEO_Branched_Module_Digital_Marketing_Guide.zip

The module includes:
- 8 interactive slides covering the core SEO concepts.
- Adaptive branching logic that re‑directs learners based on their confidence scores (≥ 80 % passes to the next concept, otherwise they review the same slide).
- 40 auto‑generated quiz items (multiple‑choice, true/false, short answer) aligned with each concept.
- Full SCORM‑2004 compliance.

Let me know if you’d like to add any custom branding, voice‑over narration, or modify the pass threshold.
